Reviews.Title: tough as nails phone
Reviews.Author: aaron
Reviews.Content: i've dropped this phone in the ocean dozens of times, and it just keeps on going.  great price, super reliable, long battery life.

Reviews.Title: Most Rugged Phone
Reviews.Author: Steven Hoober
Reviews.Content: We've been devoted Casio people for years, and they are the best rugged phones, but this is the best of those. Dropped literally thousands of times, immersed, chewed on by babies and dogs, used in heat and cold. This phone does not mind.It's old and slow now, with a mediocre screen, but if you just need a voice and SMS phone, it works great.Also has the best charging dock ever. Indestructible, and it locks into it so you can mount the dock to a vehicle or wall.So good, I just dusted off one used continuously for years, since this was a new phone, and gave it to another teenager. It works fine, after much use and abuse.

Reviews.Title: sturdy phone
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my husband after he got tired of paying for his smartphone and he loves it.He wanted something without data and that wouldn't break if he accidently dropped it on the floor or in water.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Tammy Curtiss
Reviews.Content: My dad had this phone for years it is very durable, his screen  finally was just about on readable so I bought this as a replacement, My dad is not someone who can use a touch screen, it is very hard to find a phone as durable

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Brittany Kinney
Reviews.Content: I love it and I love that I can make phone calls in the shower yay! for water proof. plus I destroy like every phone I day and this one takes the beating and asks for some more haha great phone for the clumsy

Reviews.Title: Good phone for the price
Reviews.Author: Kathy
Reviews.Content: This is good phone for the price, especially since it is water proof.  This is the third one I have purchased for the kids, and its pretty indestructable.  The speakers on it are very good and easy to hear from.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: Eliza
Reviews.Content: The phone is exactly what my husband wanted, only the screen is a little darker than his last phone that was the same kind.  Overall phone is in good condition and works great!  My husband does not want to upgrade to the newer kind of phones!

Reviews.Author: Abigail Craft
Reviews.Content: Great used phone. My dad is really enjoying it. Great condition for it to be refurbished and a great price.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: JujuMama
Reviews.Content: Some phone functions don't work but it does the job of being a phone. Not that passed but it looks nice anyway.. New looking

Reviews.Title: no camera
Reviews.Author: Dewdrop94
Reviews.Content: beware this is the no camera verson, you can get it for 20 at other places with no camera, and 40 with the camera
